io.sarl.lang.core

Interface SpaceSpecification<S extends Space>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - type of the spaces that may be created by this specification.
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EventSpaceSpecification, OpenEventSpaceSpecification, RestrictedAccessEventSpaceSpecification

    public interface SpaceSpecification<S extends Space>
    The Specification of an Interaction Space.

    The SpaceSpecification defines the rules (including action and perception) for interacting within a given set of Spaces respecting this specification.

    Version:
    0.3.0 2015-12-14 12:48:32
    Author:
    Sebastian Rodriguez, Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.sarl.lang
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.sarl.lang.core

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      S create(SpaceID id, Object... params)
      Creates a Space that respects this specification.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        S create(SpaceID id,
         Object... params)
        Creates a Space that respects this specification.
        Parameters:
        id - - the SpaceID for the newly created Space
        params - - initialization parameters for the Space
        Returns:
        an instance of Space
